A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: That's right RT\, not a fake account\, just another person who created their 1st account to vent about this movie. I'll vent quickly what everyone else is saying (Plot threads that are worthless and have holes\, no character building\, LUKE handling/disrespect\, Obvi Disney cash grab on the porgs). Kylo as a viliain is hilarious\, is he supposed to be in his 20s? I could have sworn he was an angsty 15yr old from that movie. At this point I'm just coming to these reviews for therapy after what I just watched. \n\nAnd @ everyone who's saying the fans are taking it too hard and shouldn't get \"possessive/feel like they own the franchise\,\" it's called emotional equity. This is the goal of every movie/brand/etc. so yes\, there is investment. From an objective storytelling pov\, certain plotlines are unnecessary and a lot of time is wasted setting up things to fail.
